SEARCH

Package nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.structures

@NonNullByDefault package nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.structures
This package contains classes that define, manipulate, and manage structures.

Structures follow the 'multiton' pattern, where only 1 instance can exist for each UID, where UID > 0. This is enforced through the usage the StructureRegistry.

  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.structures.structurearchetypes
    Contains interfaces for structures that define certain archetypes of structures.
